name: **Illauneeragh**
description: Illauneeragh V717-586 Sheet 84 Unnamed on the OS but named Illauneeragh on the chart, this is a most pleasant island. Sheep grazed, the grass is short, and there is room for half a dozen tents in a sheltered wee hollow in the centre. Reefs jut out westwards in a manner that is highly efficient in catching driftwood. Land at a beach / cove on the S side. Attached on the E side to the mainland at LW via another unnamed islet.
